name: Remote Debug
description:
What is Remote Debug?

There was a problem occured, and now you need to start the remote debug process. Take the remote car under your control to find out what was the source of the problem. Nothing will go wrong (probably).

Key features
  • PS1-styled atmosphere
  • Procedural generated road
  • Short-story horror experience
  • Different gameplay style during the game
  • Control your own small car
Controls

W A S D : movement

Mouse : look around

E : interact

Developer

Game by Serious Daniel (Daniel Oschepkov)

Made with Unity

Some sound used from zvukipro.com

Some models used from sketchfab.com

Links

My YouTube channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCmUzA5T_kN8Eu4VQ2j1f3mw

Please, write comment with your opinion about the game :)

You can also support me by donating on itch (if you wish)
